__e: So now, on to the matter of Peter's wedding. We can't all take a week off for the wedding of an ex-employee. It's unprofessional.
- I can't take my day off to be with him because I have yet another homicide to solve. - Oh.
In fact, he had just taken some vacation days to work the case.
I peed in a cup like everybody else. I cashed in my vacation days. I've got none left.
See, I'm not on vacation and I don't have a lot of time to do this.
Over a month I've been here, using all my vacation time and then some.
I have eight weeks paid vacation, and my family doesn't know. Whoo-hoo.
